Q12N. Summary Table: Thinking about your local community, to what extent do you agree or disagree with the following statements?
I would be willing to work together with others on something to improve my local community
When people in this area get involved, they can really change this community
If I needed help, there are people who would be there for me
People in my local community can be trusted
I have opportunities to join in with things in my community
I am able to play a role in my community
My community isn't the same as it used to be
Difficult times in recent years (e.g. Covid-19 and Cost of Living crisis) has pulled us closer together
